channel.title: Pod Surf TV
channel.itunes:author: Surfing presented by Pod Surf TV
channel.description: Surfing from around the world. Watch the worlds best surfers, in the best surf locations doing the best surf tricks. Pod Surf TV is a mixed bag of surf entertainment, surfing interviews, surfing news and surfing gossip from around the world. Log on to win stuff, check out the latest surfing, play games and much more. www.podsurf.tv

item.title: Commodore Ninety Four
item.itunes:author: Surfing presented by Pod Surf TV
item.description: Young sleek and full of hell. The boys Billy Kean, Oscar Scanes, Stu Kennedy and Sam Lendrum take you on a classic road trip in their commodore ninety four. Watch some amazing surfing suited with a great edit from Toby Cregan. Presented by Corona.

item.title: Gabriel Medina My Hawaii
item.itunes:author: Surfing presented by Pod Surf TV
item.description: Super grommet Gabriel Medina has been rippin it with his Brazilian brilliance since he launched into the WCT, winning two out of his four events. Ke11y Slater has described Medina as the fresh face of surfing's future. Here's why. Presented by Corona.

item.title: BITE ME
item.itunes:author: Surfing presented by Pod Surf TV
item.description: Boys got wild down on the southern shores of Oz. Where it is, we're not gonna tell ya!) If it looks familiar, you've probably scored it, been shit-scared by the local wildlife... and you'll understand why it's one of Australia's best kept secret.

item.title: Old school surf photography
item.itunes:author: Surfing presented by Pod Surf TV
item.description: Something arty for you this week on Podsurf. Using an 1850s camera, Brooklyn photographer Joni Sternbach has created unique and inspiring images of surf culture. Check out how she captures these haunting and unpredictable scenes...

item.title: El Mar Mi Alma The Sea My Soul
item.itunes:author: Skuff TV - Action Sports : surf : Skuff TV
item.description: Described as a Chilean 'Morning of the Earth', 'El Mar, Mi Alma' is a surf film with all the soul of the ocean. Where surfing meets 'Baraka' in this journey of extreme land and seascapes topped with amazing vision of legendary surfers, Parko and Rasta.
